name: juicily
content:
juicily adverb
(LIQUID)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that produces a lot of juice, or tastes or smells of juice: After 30 minutes the marrow will be soft enough to crush juicily with a fork. The meat was juicily fragrant with rosemary and garlic.
More examplesFewer examplesServe the grapes very cold, so they burst juicily in the mouth.This is hardly the most complex and sophisticated of wines but it's clean, fresh, and juicily inviting.
